statements: SELECT * FROM voter_registration WHERE voter_id = 1;
SELECT voter_name, address FROM voter_registration WHERE date_of_birth > '1990-01-01';
SELECT * FROM voter_registration WHERE registration_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT voter_id, voter_name FROM voter_registration WHERE voter_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT MAX(date_of_birth) AS oldest_dob, MIN(date_of_birth) AS youngest_dob FROM voter_registration;
SELECT * FROM voter_registration WHERE voter_id = 1
SELECT voter_name, address, date_of_birth FROM voter_registration WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT voter_name, address FROM voter_registration WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1980-01-01' AND '1990-12-31'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_voters FROM voter_registration
SELECT * FROM voter_registration ORDER BY registration_date DESC, voter_name ASC
SELECT * FROM voter_registration;
SELECT full_name, address FROM voter_registration WHERE voter_id = 1;
SELECT full_name, date_of_birth FROM voter_registration ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT full_name, party_affiliation FROM voter_history WHERE registration_status = 'active';
SELECT * FROM voter_history WHERE voting_year = 2022 ORDER BY voter_id;
SELECT * FROM voter_registration WHERE voter_id = 12345;
SELECT full_name, address FROM voter_registration WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT v.full_name, h.party_affiliation FROM voter_registration AS v JOIN voter_history AS h ON v.voter_id = h.voter_id WHERE h.registration_status = 'active';
SELECT v.full_name, h.voting_year FROM voter_registration AS v JOIN voter_history AS h ON v.voter_id = h.voter_id WHERE h.party_affiliation = 'Democrat' ORDER BY h.voting_year DESC;
SELECT v.address, h.registration_status FROM voter_registration AS v JOIN voter_history AS h ON v.voter_id = h.voter_id WHERE h.registration_status = 'inactive' ORDER BY v.full_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM voters;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM voters WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM voters ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT voter_id, first_name, last_name, address FROM voters WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT district_name, total_voters FROM voter_district WHERE total_voters > 1000 ORDER BY total_voters DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM voters WHERE age > 18;
SELECT * FROM voters WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT voter_id, registration_date FROM voter_history ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT district_name, total_voters FROM voter_district WHERE total_voters > 500 ORDER BY district_name ASC;

SELECT v.first_name, v.last_name, vh.registration_date, vd.district_name FROM voters v INNER JOIN voter_history vh ON v.voter_id = vh.voter_id INNER JOIN voter_district vd ON vd.district_id = v.voter_id;
SELECT * FROM voter;
SELECT full_name, address FROM voter;
SELECT voter_id, full_name, registration_date FROM voter ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT v.full_name, v.address, vs.status_name FROM voter v JOIN voter_history vh ON v.voter_id = vh.voter_id JOIN voter_status vs ON vh.status_id = vs.status_id;
SELECT v.full_name, vd.district_name FROM voter v JOIN voter_district vd ON v.district_id = v.district_id;
SELECT * FROM voter;
SELECT full_name, registration_date FROM voter ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT v.full_name, vs.status_name, vh.change_date FROM voter v JOIN voter_history vh ON v.voter_id = vh.voter_id JOIN voter_status vs ON vh.status_id = vs.status_id;
SELECT v.full_name, vd.district_name FROM voter v JOIN voter_district vd ON v.district_id = vd.district_id;

SELECT v.full_name, vd.district_name, vs.status_name FROM voter v JOIN voter_district vd ON v.district_id = vd.district_id JOIN voter_history vh ON v.voter_id = vh.voter_id JOIN voter_status vs ON vh.status_id = vs.status_id;
SELECT * FROM voters;
SELECT voter_name, voter_age, voter_address FROM voters;
SELECT voter_name, voter_address, registration_date FROM voters ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT voter_name, voter_age FROM voters WHERE voter_age > 30;
SELECT voter_name, voter_address, city, state FROM voters INNER JOIN voter_address ON voters.voter_id = voter_address.voter_id;
SELECT * FROM voters;
SELECT voter_name, voter_age, voter_address FROM voters WHERE voter_age > 30;
SELECT voter_name, email FROM voters JOIN voter_contact ON voters.voter_id = voter_contact.voter_id WHERE email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT voter_name, voter_address, last_voted_date FROM voters JOIN voter_history ON voters.voter_id = voter_history.voter_id WHERE last_voted_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT district_name, registered_voters FROM voter_district WHERE registered_voters > 1000 ORDER BY district_name DESC;
